00002 /*! return a transposed column vector */
00003 inline _dcovector t(const _drovector& rovec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] t(const _drovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010   _dcovector covec;
00011   covec.L =rovec.L;
00012   delete [] covec.Array;
00013   covec.Array =rovec.Array;
00014   
00015   return covec;
00016 }

00019 /*! return its Euclidean norm */
00020 inline double nrm2(const _drovector& vec)
00021 {
00022 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00023   std::cerr << "# [MARK] nrm2(const _drovector&)"
00024             << std::endl;
00025 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00026   
00027   double val( dnrm2_(vec.L, vec.Array, 1) );
00028   vec.destroy();
00029   return val;
00030 }

00033 /*! return the index of element having the largest absolute value
00034   in 0-based numbering system */
00035 inline long idamax(const _drovector& vec)
00036 {
00037 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00038   std::cerr << "# [MARK] idamax(const _drovector&)"
00039             << std::endl;
00040 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00041   
00042   long i( idamax_(vec.L, vec.Array, 1) -1 );
00043   vec.destroy();
00044   return i;
00045 }

00047 //=============================================================================
00048 /*! return its largest absolute value */
00049 inline double damax(const _drovector& vec)
00050 {
00051 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00052   std::cerr << "# [MARK] damax(const _drovector&)"
00053             << std::endl;
00054 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00055   
00056   double val( vec.Array[idamax_(vec.L, vec.Array, 1)-1] );
00057   vec.destroy();
00058   return val;
00059 }
